website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a high quality, smooth, and fast wine opener, this is a top choice.
pros: Durable materials, clever design, and ease and efficiency of opening make this wine opener stand out
Users report that it is sturdy, holds up well over time (even after opening hundreds of bottles), and has an attractive appearance
cons: A few said it only works on standard-size wine bottles and not those with large diameter tops
A few also didn't experience it lasting as well over time as others

customer_reviews.title: They both suck.
customer_reviews.text: We miss our old one that has 2 levers on each side. Push the two small levers down to penetrate then push the 2 larger ones down to remove the cork. Unfortunately you can't buy it anymore. My wife could work that opener easily. She has a little trouble with this one. Maybe make the lever 4" longer. Update: I have 2 of these. Sometimes the screw goes in and then comes back out without removing the cork. I'm squeezing the heck out of it so that's not the problem. They both do it.
customer_reviews.author: McNystrom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this for 3 months, and while it is extremely easy to use it broke this evening when I was trying to release the cork I’d just removed from a bottle. I spent a lot of money on this opener and was hoping I’d get my money’s worth. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER---AND I HAVE OWNED SEVERAL
customer_reviews.text: My similar model wine opener broke after several hundred uses and I wanted a like replacement. I could not find the same model, but discovered this one that I like much better. Not only does it have a sleek design, but it uncorks wine much more smoothly, with much less effort. An added bonus is that the foil cutter is a unique design that works the first time and doesn't require several passes. I highly recommend this product to any wine lover.
customer_reviews.author: 55NormaJean

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy to use wine bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: We love this style of opener, but have had problems with the lift handle breaking. We have been using this one since we ordered it and so far find it easy to use, and quite sturdy. It is wise to pay attention to the actual screw piece since, when it starts to get dull, the handle is harder to pull up. However, we both have had hand surgeries, so we really appreciate when these openers are well made and work easily.
customer_reviews.author: Martine Renoir

customer_reviews.title: Terrific! Never used a simpler
customer_reviews.text: Terrific! Never used a simpler, easier or just plain cooler corkscrew! It's been said that if you invent a better mousetrap, the world will beat a path to your door. Meet the greatest "mousetrap" ever. I have no idea what the reviewers meant with some of their issues, this is SO simple to use. Follow directions, and voila` it's open! Even simpler is removing the cork from the device, I think it may be easier than falling out of bed. Sorry I had not discovered this device years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good  but wrong color
customer_reviews.text: It works great but shows a completely different color scheme. The picture is of a chrome corkscrew, but mine is a corny looking black with disco red trim. Ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Y'all Have Saved My Life........Well, sort of!
customer_reviews.text: Since I broke, somehow or another, the last wine cork opener which I had originally considered the be-all-and-end-all of wine openers, I once again returned to Amazon.com in order to find the latest and the best-est opener quickly before my husband discovered that I had broken the other. Amazon.com did not fail me for there it was,this opener, so I ordered it and true-to-Amazon-form, it arrived quickly! I practiced using it before my husband arrived home and it is all plus more than it was written up to be. Thank y'all ever so much, because THIS ONE is the very best and I do not foresee any chance of my breaking this one! JJ
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: For years I struggled with one of those "wing" type wine openers, sometime having success, often not, and frequently messing up the cork after multiple tries. I don't drink a lot of wine, but I dreaded having to open a bottle. This wine opener worked for me easily on the first try. I had to look at a video on YouTube however to figure out how to eject the cork once it was out. I am very much NOT mechanically talented. I had tried one of those electric wine openers and it did not remove the cork. So I'm very happy with this one and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as it Looks
customer_reviews.text: The wine opener does what it is supposed to, but the mechanism is far from precise. It is definitely not the quality that I would expect from Brookstone. The "presentation box" is just a patterned cardboard box with a cover. Sure, you could put a tag on it and give it as gift without wrapping it, but a "presentation box" implies something much nicer. It does not come with a spare spiral or any other accessories except the foil cutter. I'll keep it, but I don't think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: The Wine Commonsewer

customer_reviews.title: Best wedding gift we received!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of every wedding gift we received, this is our absolute favorite. I have literally ordered this for three other friends as gifts since we got one. So easy to use, and much more compact than the traditional rabbit (who really has that much drawer space anyways). It looks just like the le creuset version I had years ago, but so much more reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This corkscrew looks and feels very durable, we used it for 3 months, then it started pushing the cork into the wine bottle.....not good!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bobzien

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I've waited for about 6 months of use before writing this review. We open about 4-5 bottles of wine per week with this. Best cork screw we've ever owned so far. It has nice ergonomics and seems very durable. So far, no broken corks using this model. The spiral is always guided to center with the cork. The spiral (or helix) vs auger is the way to go. This cork is simple to use and requires little effort to pull cork.
customer_reviews.author: J. SCHWARZ

customer_reviews.title: Corks removed in no time at all
customer_reviews.text: Works well - much faster than our old, battery-operated opener, and does not require an inordinate amount of force. Appears to be well-made with a comforting degree of heft, indicating metal construction rather than plastic. Even the very simple foil cutter is very effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GibyJ

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very smooth action. All rabbit style openers I've owned (at least a half dozen) have lasted a year or less. They were also half the price of this model. I'll give it a try. It does seem a bit more heavy duty, so we'll see. If I get two plus years out of it, i'll gladly add another star. Right now it's one star off for pricing.
customer_reviews.author: YoBro

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for ~ 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several wine openers from Amazon over the past few years, with all them failing within 1 - 3 months. This one seemed to be the exception, more sturdy and working quite well for the first two months or so. After ~ 2 months, while the wine opener would still remove corks effectively, it will not release them as it initially did. The process to get the cork off the screw (helix) after the wine is opened is now so difficult that we've stopped using it entirely.
customer_reviews.author: LJF

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I really like the more compact design of this opener versus the "Rabbit" style. It's easy to use, seems sturdy, and for my first opening, it pulled out a synthetic cork. Great opener for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brandon Long

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best wine opener I have ever owned. I waited quite a while before reviewing to make sure it lasted. It has. It's solid and works perfectly. I drink a fair share of and have put this opener to the test. It's great. The extras it comes with are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie LaMar

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for awhile but the cork gets stuck in it and will not come out unless manually winding out the cork yourself. Please kindly provide a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dung N.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, durable.
customer_reviews.text: I manage a busy bar where we serve lots of wine by the glass. This has been a fantastic tool for my bartenders. They can open bottles much faster than using a wine key. It has held up really well to all the use. I'll be buying one for my home too.
customer_reviews.author: M Martin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism freezes up when we try to use it after a few months. The previous one (different maker) worked for years before finally dying. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best wine opener I've used
customer_reviews.text: It gets docked a point for the plastic parts. Overall it makes opening wine bottles easy and taking the cork off actually fun. This product won't murder your wrist. Believe me, on my first use I made Sangria for a large party and opened about 6 bottles of red wine in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Sinister

customer_reviews.title: A great opener and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful opener. We had a similar, cheaper brand that we loved, however much of it was plastic. It worked well, but one of the plastic pieces broke off and it could no longer be used. We needed to replace it and decided to give this model a try. It is very easy to use. It does not take strength to work it. Most of this model is metal so I suspect that it will last longer than our previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Knitting Nut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but...
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made, easy to use & excellent quality. The issue is that it does not completeLy remove standard size corks from the bottle requiring you to wiggle the opener. Perhaps I have effective product versus a product wide issue!
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. I expected better from Brookstone. When I pulled the opener from the packaging, the silver material (either metal or plastic) appeared cloudy and smudged almost even scratched looking. The quality was poor. I can't give a review as far as if it worked because I just put it back in the packaging and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LM Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Opener
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product. Very well made and has very smooth operation. My old Metrokane Rabbit did not work well on several different types of corks, and when it did, it was difficult to eject the cork from the mechanism. This device is a great improvement-not as bulky and able to uncork every bottle I have tried. The effort required is minimal. Even the foil cutter is great. The unit has a substantial feel and an attractive chrome finish.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The best opener
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this. It's truly worth the price. Extremely easy to use. Durable and strong. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Loyola

customer_reviews.title: A favorite.

customer_reviews.author: George Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Opens a bottle with ease - I think it's easier than my first one. I'm puzzled why anyone wouldn't get one of these - it's cheap enough and hard to see how it could be better. Also beautiful. My first Brookstone wine opener lasted 15 years. Had to put a little olive oil on piston a couple of times,
customer_reviews.author: B. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: No more struggling with a wine key!
customer_reviews.text: This opener is amazing! No more struggling with a wine key! It is really easy to use and very well made. It is worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: Very good with a small warning.

My wife won't use it because it is too difficult for her to get the cork out of the opener.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend

customer_reviews.author: FrankieJohnny

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product and it worked flawlessly at first (purchased in December). Opened wine bottles with ease. Now it will open bottles, but releasing the cork and resetting the opener into the closed position is super difficult. It was nice while it lasted. The issue could be a fluke, I would be willing to exchange it and try again with the same product.
customer_reviews.author: SamRey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as working with both natural corks and synthetic corks, however the instructions that came with the item states that it is not to be used with synthetic corks. I probably would have kept in anyway, but it did not work. I tried three times on three different bottles, and the it would only pull the cork out about 1/4 of the way. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Does not work most of the time
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to get the opener to pull the corkscrew out instead of just unwinding the screw out of the cork. Some times it works properly but most times it does not.
customer_reviews.author: I.C.P.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL ALL THE TIME
customer_reviews.text: It is very strong and when my electric wine opener doesn't work or at least work well, this one never fails me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Best Wine Opener
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through a number of rabbit-style openers. This is the easiest that we've ever used. My husband was skeptical because it looks a little different than what he was used to, but now he's a fan. Opens bottles so easily, and the cork is so easy to remove when you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Joycie K

customer_reviews.title: Well made cork puller!  Easy to use--feels solid!
customer_reviews.text: The best wine opener I have used! Looks like the Rabbit opener but more robust construction.
customer_reviews.author: JimMetcalf

customer_reviews.title: Great for now, feels like it's a little chintzy
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. But it feels like it could sh*t the bed any day now. Only used it 3 times. But compared to the cheap bottle openers i'm used to, it's great. When it does break, I will probably buy another one because it's so damn convenient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use opener and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, simple and compact wine opener. I’ve had the traditional “rabbit” wine opener which is monsterous compared to this; the Oster electric opener takes longer to open a bottle. Great buy and the customer service is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Only wish they lasted longer...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wine opener we have found. My only complaint is that we end up replacing it every 12-18 months when the screw part becomes worn. We have ordered replacement screws, but they are never quite right. This is not an inexpensive wine opener, but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton H.

customer_reviews.title: ... this device for about 6 months now and absolutely love it. I own both the Rabbit and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this device for about 6 months now and absolutely love it. I own both the Rabbit and this device and prefer this device by far. Not only is it easier and faster to open a bottle of wine, but it's also a lot easier to store in a drawer. In addition, it appears it won't get out of alignment like my Rabbit did after three years of solid use.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron H.

customer_reviews.title: Best opener
customer_reviews.text: The best wine opener I've ever tried. Easy to use, even if you don't have a strong grip. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: EZ to use ... reasonably priced.  Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this wine opener ... quality, EZ to use and reasonable pricing. Comfortable highly recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Mel

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY AND WORKS FAB!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Works like a breeze. In past, I had a rabbit type opener which was much better than the simpler twist types, But WHOA this one is the bomb! I love it! This takes a minimal of effort which is great since I have arthritis and am generally not strong so ease of opening is key to me. I plan to order one for all my friends who enjoy a glass of cheap, red italian wine...
customer_reviews.author: Gary Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I was looking for. Takes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. Takes up less space than the rabbit style openers and the metal handle feels much more robust than the last plastic handle I broke trying to open a bottle of wine. I just hope that for the price it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Huff

customer_reviews.title: 50+ bottles opened in 3 mths, no issues!
customer_reviews.text: Still too early to tell how long this will last but its sturdy and seems well built and is very easy to operate. Overall Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bentsen

customer_reviews.title: Came without vital part.
customer_reviews.text: Came missing a piece. Corkscrew cannot be used......and Brookstone went bankrupt. So now we are out of luck😟
customer_reviews.author: Vance Finney

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my wife. The foil cutter works very well. We opened several bottle of wine Christmas eve and Christmas day. This opener is working very well so far. We love that you can easily remove the cork from the scres.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Better than a rabbit
customer_reviews.text: Better than a rabbit--my second one, for another house; 1st one has worked perfectly for 5 years or more! The foil-cutter, included with the opener, is the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: R. LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these over the years for women in my life, and both have loved it. It is hands down, without comparison, an upgrade to ANY traditional corkscrew. To operate this thing takes very little strength. A child could use it easily (but probably shouldn't..) It is also built to last. Unless you lose it I don't think it will ever need replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and staff loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works like a champ. Bought this for full production micro brewery. Much quicker to serve customers.
customer_reviews.author: ShepFL

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: The product broke in less than 2 months. Only used on regular corks (not synthetic) The silver screw on the end of the opener flies off every time you try to push the wine screw into the cork. Total waste of money. Disappointed in Brookstones lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Downey

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife used to so much trouble opening wine using other types of openers, but the first time she used this one she got it open quickly and easily. She thinks it's great and so do I, couldn't be any easier to use. I looked at them for a while, should have ordered one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Invention no fuss super easy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even compare just buy this. I had always used the more manual types until my sister let me borrow hers. Hands down this is great. Makes a good gift too
customer_reviews.author: JoyTpgh

customer_reviews.title: Best Wine Opener money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best Wine Opener money can buy. A little pricey relatively pricey. But my first one lasted about 10 years - which is long enough for me to feel I got my money's worth. As a short and non-muscular female, this is the only open I've ever used that was a breeze. Not only does the cork pull right out easily, simple to get the cork off after it is out of the bottle. Almost a one-step process.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Mertens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sleek & easy to use. Wonderful instructions about NOT using with certain corks. Might have been my problem with other wine openers.
customer_reviews.author: AAA's opinion

customer_reviews.title: Best wine opener ever.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wine openers I've ever used. Super sturdy, quality is great, and it's easy to use. We always get compliments when we have company. Would be an excellent gift for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this wine opener
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite wine opener. I have tried many styles and I can make them all work in one fashion or another, but this is quick, easy and actually kind of fun to use! It takes the cork out in a jiffy, and then pops it right off the cork screw just as fast. People watching me open a wine bottle often comment on how easy it looks. Because it is!
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wine bottle opener! So easy to use and much better quality than I expected for the modest price. Try it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle opener that stores easily
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use bottle opener. I had the two eared rabbit version of this bottle opener and it was difficult to store in a drawer because it would open up and jam the drawer. The single lever action of this model eliminates the problem and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: AlexO

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality. Broke after 1-3 uses for me.
customer_reviews.text: I used it one or two times and it broke. Very disappointed. I tried to get a refund but it was beyond my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K. Cavote

customer_reviews.title: Will last
customer_reviews.text: Simple design my to last. You can immediately feel the quality once you hold it in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All it was promised to be!
customer_reviews.text: I read probably 100 reviews of wine openers and was impressed enough by the many excellent reviews it earned to try the Brookstone Compact Wine Opener, and it has exceeded expectations. It wasn't the most expensive, but it definitely received the best reviews. The foil cutter is easy to use and the actual wine opener is very simple to operate. It works every time with no fuss, and you don't have to be a weight lifter to use it. I highly recommend this wine opener, and if it ever breaks (which seems unlikely)...I am replacing it with the same kind.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson, AZ

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly every time. Really easy to use. Would have given it 10 stars if possible. The foil cutter does an excellent job
customer_reviews.author: Judge

customer_reviews.title: When you buy a Brookstone product on Amazon the warranty is voided
customer_reviews.text: Beware of seller who does not back the manufacturers warranty
customer_reviews.author: Anne M Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Best Corkscrew
customer_reviews.text: I have used numerous corkscrews. Electric ones seem to lose their power after a short period of time and I was having issues with the manual ones. The rabbit brand seemed to die after about a year. This one is very sturdy and well made, has a great grip area and comes out clean every time.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Much more compact than my wine bottle opener that I bought from Sam's Club.
customer_reviews.author: Zophisticated Dove

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edge on the handle!
customer_reviews.text: Found a sharp edge of metal on the handle that could cut someone. Was the same on my replacement item. Really too bad because otherwise looks nice. So sad to see from Brookstone that used to sell such great products when it was in business.
customer_reviews.author: Bls

customer_reviews.title: Best wine opener!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! This makes opening wine so easy, which you can get from many wine openers. What many other wine openers do not do is make it so easy to get the cork off of the screw and this one does! Some may say it is too pricey but the way I see it is I will never be buying another wine opener.
customer_reviews.author: tc0984

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how little effort is needed to get the cork out. Great for those with arthritis in hands. Only minuses: pricey, and bulky to store it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Best wine opener on market
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and sturdy. Best on the market and I've tried all of them.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than other wine openers!
customer_reviews.text: This one is so easy to use and feels very sturdy. We've broken three wine openers in the past couple of years because they are not made very well. I think this one will last!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great rabbit-screw type wine opener
customer_reviews.text: Great rabbit-screw type wine opener. Solidly built and easy to use with the the main parts under stress made of metal unlike many mostly plastic varieties. This is my third opener of this type (I've been using it for 6 months or so) and would say it is the best I've used thus far. It doesn't come with a foil remover but if you've gone thru a set or two like me you probably already have one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lebeck

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this kind of opener before with good results. This arrived used, broken, and missing parts. It even had an old red wine cork inside the opener. I wouldn’t recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST WINE OPENER!
customer_reviews.text: Opens wine bottles in 3 seconds quickly and efficiently. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: chris gardner show

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this opener at a winery in my hometown. So happy I finally have one! I’m so happy with it. I’ll definitely recommend it to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy
customer_reviews.text: I classify my family as wine snobs, and they've used every kind of wine opener imaginable. When my father's handy-dandy-very-expensive-gadget died last fall, I researched the ratings and bought him this one for Christmas. No more ten-minute production, no more drama about the cork getting stuck or breaking. Boom, done, let's drink.
customer_reviews.author: ARL

customer_reviews.title: DreM wine opener
customer_reviews.text: This wine opener is a dream to use....smooth movement, very little need for leverage, love it!

customer_reviews.title: Won't Remove Entire Cork
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this cork screw on many, many bottles of wine (with real corks). Most of the time it does not remove the cork the entire way, so I am left to figure out how to remove the balance of the cork remaining in the bottle. Perhaps it has to do with the wine I am purchasing (mostly California) and they all have long corks. But, I think it's an inadequate product.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Wino

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite wines is very hard to uncork but with this - I can do it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this opener. The only problem with some of the other openers is with the type of wire the girlfriend buys. There is a wax top over the cork. With the POWER openers the wax gets caught inside. This unit does a very good job. You still need a little muscle power to remove the cork from the opener.

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of wine openers
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had many, many, many wine openers but nothing comes close to this. It’s super easy and it just feels sturdy and well built. It’s like the Cadillac of wine openers. You won’t regret this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this. Easy to use and works great.

customer_reviews.title: Simple & easy to uncork wine!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and if given as a gift it is packaged well! It’s the only wine opener I will use. I had one for 10 years and it finally broke. So happy to find the same one still out in the market!
